DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Pectoral Nerves Blockade Persistent Pain After Breast Cancer Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study 2 part : Part 1 description anatomy PECS block pain free , unoperated patient use ultrasonography ( non invasive ) . Part 2 administration block patient persistent pain breast cancer surgery . Before block take detail pain history neurophysiological test call quantitative sensory testing ( QST ) . These test assess patient ' ability feel warmth , cold test threshold pain . The block administer use ultrasound guidance 20mls 0.25 % bupivacaine inject pectoral muscle side pain . Thirty minute block , pain assess QST repeat .
